TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MatrixConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts instances of other types to and from a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use a MatrixConverter to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> from an attribute string; use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Converters.MatrixValueSerializer> to create a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure.
## Examples The following example uses a MatrixConverter to convert a string into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>.
[!code-cs[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixConverterExample_csharp](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/MatrixExamples_snip/MatrixExample.cs#matrixconverterexample_csharp)]
